appsgate.lig.manager.context.impl
Class ContextManagerImpl

java.lang.Object
  appsgate.lig.manager.context.impl.ContextManagerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextManagerSpec
public class ContextManagerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ContextManagerSpec

This ApAM component is used to maintain space information for any object in the smart habitat.

Since:
February 10, 2014
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard
See Also:
